name: A Lonely Walk by Kieran Ritchie (2021)
name_original: A Lonely Walk by Kieran Ritchie (2021)
description:
A Lonely Walk by Kieran Ritchie

A solo games jam project was completed within 48 hours.

I was originally in a team with programmers to add mechanics but they didn't follow through so it's just my level.

This was for Global Games Jam 2019.
